products.title: Lenovo

products.title: Headset
products.description: Yealink BH70 Wireless Bluetooth Headset with Microphone for Work, up to 35h Talking Battery Life, 3-Mic Noise Cancellation, 147g Lightweight Microsoft Teams Certified Headphone for Open Office, USB-A
MoreInformation: Teams Certification ▶ Yealink has always maintained close cooperation with Microsoft. This new BH70 headset has been certified by Microsoft Teams, and you can join Teams meetings with one click on the headset to ensure that you can enjoy the original experience of Teams seamlessly during your work. When users make a call or attend a meeting, the visibility indicators of the BH70 automatically glow red to reduce external interference and allow users to focus on the conversation.

Immersive Calls ▶ With the support of Yealink acoustic shield technology, the three built-in 3 MEMS microphones of BH70 can automatically block background noise while ensuring that participants' voices are clearly conveyed, greatly improving communication efficiency. Whether it’s a busy conference call in the office or noisy background sounds in an open work area, it is no longer an obstacle to the quality of communication.

Brilliant Audio Quality ▶ The BH70 also has excellent voice reception capabilities, any factors that may lead to increased distortion or blur are avoided. Whether you're in a busy office environment or on-the-go, the BH70 ensures that your calls are clear and professional. On the other hand, when it comes to music mode, BH70 headphones use dynamic EQ adapts to different genres of music to deliver an immersive audio experience with rich bass, detailed midrange tones, and crisp highs.

All-day Wearing Comfort ▶ Through hundreds of head-form evaluations and thousands of wearing comfort tests, we have ensured that BH70 headset provides optimal support and comfort for extended periods of use, which meet the highest ergonomic standards. Furthermore, the carefully selected materials used in constructing this headset ensure that it remains light on your head while still maintaining durability and sturdiness.

Power Battery Life ▶ Yealink's battery performance has always maintained an industry advantage, this BH70 bluetooth headset is designed to provide an exceptional talk time of up to 35 hours, ensuring that you can stay connected and engaged for extended periods without worrying about battery life.

products.title: Headset
products.description: Yealink Bluetooth Headset BH71,Wireless Bluetooth Earpiece with 4 Noise Canceling Microphones,Teams&Zoom Certified,Mute Function,Connect to PC Cell Phone iPhone Android Driving Business Office
MoreInformation: 【Bluetooth 5.2】Adopted Bluetooth 5.2 technology provides you super clear voice for talking. You can move freely with up to a 130ft (40 m) range, which gives you up to 4X the range of other Bluetooth headsets. Fast and easy to pair two devices at once.Compatible with iPhone, Android, tablets, laptops, and other leading smartphones.

【Great Noise Canceling】Upgraded BH71 Bluetooth earpiece adopts 4-Mic Beamforming Noise Cancellation Technology with multiple microphones to block 90% background noise for clearer calls. so your voice comes through clearly, especially outdoors.

【Hands-Free Call & Mute Function】Activate Siri, and Google Assistant to allow you to easily answer, end, or reject calls, freeing your hands. Besides, the mute button on the Bluetooth earpieces can easily mute. During important business meetings, when there is an incoming call, you can activate the mute function at any time when answering, to prevent the other party from hearing, to protect your company's secrets, and then continue the meeting.

【Ergonomic Design】bluetooth headset easily adjusts the ear hook to fit your ear best. Pull out the hook and put it on, and you can wear it with all-day comfort. The whole headset only weighs 18 grams/0.63oz, which makes your ear happy all day. 3Pcs different sizes ear tips to meet your needs.

【Long Battery Life】Supports 7 hours of continuous talking and 216 hours of standby times in 1.5 hours single charge. it’s convenient for you to travel for a long time without frequently searching for a charging port.

products.title: Computer Mouse
products.description: Amazon Basics 2.4 Ghz Wireless Optical Computer Mouse with USB Nano Receiver, Black
MoreInformation: Wireless mouse in Black (30-pack) for easily navigating a computer interface; click, scroll, and more

2.4 GHz wireless connection (does not support Bluetooth); uses a USB nano receiver that can stay plugged into your computer without obstructing other ports or can stow inside the wireless mouse when not in use; note: receiver is stored inside the mouse from production and needs to be removed upon setup
Optical sensor works on most surfaces
3 buttons offer effortless fingertip control
Compatible with Windows 2000, XP, Vista, 7, 8, and 10
Easy installation; refer to user manual for instructions
Product Dimensions: 4 x 2.3 x 1.6 inches (LxWxH)
